alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:00AM CDT until July 14 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN GRANT AND SOUTH CENTRAL CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Bloomington, or 13 miles east of Prairie Du Chien, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Lancaster and Fennimore around 220 AM CDT. Platteville around 240 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Preston, Arthur, Werley, Mount Ida, Livingston, Union and Stitzer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
